home.title: Vryce - Leading Digital Marketing Agency in Indonesia
home.description: Vryce is a performance-driven digital marketing agency focusing on data-backed strategies and real business results.

hero.title: Digital Marketing Agency
hero.description: Vryce is a digital marketing agency specializing in performance-driven, data-focused, and result-oriented strategies. We help your business scale through innovative and effective digital marketing solutions.

about.title: Maximizing Growth Through Data, Performance, and Real Results.
about.paragraph_1: We believe effective digital marketing goes beyond just running campaigns. Therefore, Vryce manages the entire marketing ecosystem as an integrated system, ensuring every channel contributes significantly to our clients' business goals.
about.paragraph_2: Vryce offers a comprehensive suite of services, including performance ads, SEO & SEM, KOL and affiliate marketing, social media strategy, landing page development, marketing automation, and AI-based digital marketing. Our mission is to drive sustainable brand growth and maximize your digital marketing objectives.

services.title: Service Packages & Pricing
services.description: Choose a strategic partner designed to accelerate your growth. Our performance-based packages are tailored to deliver measurable impact and sustainable business results.

why.title: Why Choose Vryce?
why.description: We combine data-driven precision with creative excellence to turn your marketing spend into measurable business growth through a results-oriented approach.
why.points: Focus on performance and business results | Data-driven marketing strategies | Quality talent & creator management | Affiliate marketing as a growth engine | Flexible: retainer, project-based, or performance-based

about.title: About Vryce
about.sub_headline: Solusi Terintegrasi untuk Digital Marketing Performa Tinggi
about.paragraph_1: Vryce is a digital marketing agency focused on performance-driven, data-led strategies that deliver real business results. We help brands not only establish a digital presence but achieve measurable growth—from brand awareness and traffic to leads, conversions, and sales.
about.paragraph_2: We believe effective digital marketing goes beyond just running campaigns. Therefore, Vryce manages the entire marketing ecosystem as an integrated system, ensuring every channel contributes significantly to our clients' business goals.
about.paragraph_3: Vryce offers a comprehensive suite of services, including performance ads, SEO & SEM, KOL and affiliate marketing, social media strategy, landing page development, marketing automation, and AI-based digital marketing. Our mission is to drive sustainable brand growth and maximize your digital marketing objectives.

talent.title: Vryce Talent & Creator Management
talent.paragraph_1: As a service differentiator, Vryce also features Talent & Creator Management, specifically focusing on the fashion, skincare, and makeup industries.
talent.paragraph_2: Talent under Vryce management serve not only as content creators but as performance-driven talent optimized for:
talent.p2_list: Supporting fashion & beauty product sales | Supporting performance ads campaigns | Serving as KOLs and affiliates | Enhancing brand trust, credibility, and conversion
talent.paragraph_3: Our talent is selected based on:
talent.p3_list: Niche relevance (fashion, skincare, makeup) | Engagement & audience quality | Ability to drive campaign impact and sales
talent.paragraph_4: Through this model, Vryce bridges brands, talent, and performance marketing systems into a single ecosystem—ensuring campaigns are not only visually engaging but deliver measurable results.

service_1.title: Vryce Performance Ads Package
service_1.purpose: Generate leads, inquiries, or fast sales through data-driven paid advertising.
service_1.benefits: Ad Platform (Meta / Google / TikTok) | Strategy & funnel planning | Campaign setup & optimization | Ads copy & creative direction | Weekly optimization | Monthly performance report

service_2.title: Vryce SEO & SEM Package
service_2.purpose: Increase brand visibility on Google and drive high-quality traffic and customers for the mid-to-long term.
service_2.benefits: Website & keyword audit | On-page & technical SEO | Google Search Ads (SEM) | Funnel & keyword strategy | Weekly optimization | Tracking & analytics | Ranking & search performance monitoring | Monthly report

service_3.title: Vryce KOL Marketing Package
service_3.purpose: Boost awareness, trust, and sales through talent and Key Opinion Leaders (KOL).
service_3.benefits: Talent & KOL | Campaign planning & briefing | Sales-driven content | Performance tracking & report

service_4.title: Vryce Affiliate Marketing Package
service_4.purpose: Build additional sales channels based on commission-driven performance.
service_4.benefits: Affiliate system setup | Recruiter & onboarding of affiliates/talent | Campaign & promo management | Tracking & payout reporting

service_5.title: Vryce Social Media Management
service_5.purpose: Consistently manage social media accounts to build brand presence and support campaigns.
service_5.benefits: Content planning & calendar | Social media content creation (Feed, Carousel, Reels) | Captions & hashtags | Scheduling & publishing | Monitoring & monthly report

service_6.title: Vryce Marketing Automation & AI Package
service_6.purpose: Automate marketing processes and enhance team efficiency.
service_6.benefits: Lead & CRM automation | Email / WhatsApp automation | AI-based optimization & insight

service_7.title: Vryce Web Development
service_7.purpose: Build professional websites to enhance brand credibility and customer trust.
service_7.benefits: Company profile / brand website | Modern & user-friendly design | Basic SEO setup | Domain & hosting setup assistance

service_8.title: Vryce Landing Page Development
service_8.purpose: Provide landing pages designed to boost brand credibility and optimize conversion rates across various channels.
service_8.benefits: Landing page | Funnel-based copywriting structure | Integrated CTA & lead forms | Basic SEO & tracking

service_9.title: Vryce Marketplace Optimization & Promotion
service_9.purpose: Optimize and promote marketplace stores to be professionally managed, easily discoverable by potential buyers, and boost sales performance.
service_9.benefits: Marketplace Seller Center management | Storefront optimization (Profile, Banner, Branding) | Product title, description, and keyword optimization | Product image & layout optimization | Basic promo setup (Discounts, Vouchers, Campaigns) | Basic marketplace ads setup (Shopee/Tokopedia Ads) | Performance monitoring & sales growth strategy
